meanings.sent1: The cave was so aphotic that I couldn't see my hand in front of my face.
meanings.sent2: The basement was so aphotic that I had to turn on a flashlight to see anything.
meanings.sent3: The aphotic room was perfect for a surprise party because no one could see the decorations beforehand.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as aphotic as the night sky, with no glimmer of happiness in sight.
meanings.sent5: The aphotic forest at night seemed like a mysterious, dark realm straight out of a fairy tale.

meanings.definition: Relating to a zone of the ocean where light does not penetrate.
meanings.sent1: The deep sea creatures thrive in the aphotic depths where sunlight cannot reach.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the aphotic zone of the ocean requires specialized equipment to withstand the darkness.
meanings.sent3: The aphotic marine life must throw amazing glow-in-the-dark parties in their underwater world.
meanings.sent4: The aphotic ocean floor is like a hidden treasure trove waiting to be discovered by brave adventurers.
meanings.sent5: The aphotic underwater world is a mysterious realm where only the most curious dare to venture.
